Home Projects

Blanc Ink

  • Web

Blanc Ink is a startup that connects laser-certified tattoo artists and medical professionals to help remove or cover up unwanted tattoos. In 2017, House House was approached to design and implement a new visual style for the landing page to checkout flow.

  • Partner in crime: Ben Groulx
  • Backend Developer: Alex Crooks

Copyright ©2017, Sean Durfee – Give me a shout!

Colophon: This site was built by myself by hand in HTML and SCSS. Fonts are Freight Sans + Freight Text by Joshua Darden, and are served up with Adobe Typekit. Everything is compiled and served through Jekyll, hosted on Github Pages. Thanks for stopping by!
